name: family-birthday-calendar
description: Family birthday calendar (shared) with accounts and admin provisioning

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev --workspace backend" "npm run dev --workspace frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace frontend && npm run build --workspace backend
scripts.start:split: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "NODE_ENV=production npm run start --workspace backend" "npm run preview --workspace frontend -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5173 --strictPort"
